listitem.para: This page contains a list of classes for which objects exist in the database (i.e. classes for which there is data associated)
Select the class from which you wish to start your query and press the Select button. This will take you to the FlyMine query builder page.
The browse button allows you to browse the complete FlyMine object model. This shows all the classes in FlyMine, some of which do not yet have data associated with them
The number on the right shows the number of objects associated with that class
Click on a class name to begin your query with that class
